statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, date_of_birth FROM customers WHERE preference_category = 'Sports' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, city FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND preference_category='Tech';
SELECT first_name, last_name, country FROM customers WHERE city='New York' OR city='Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender!='Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE category = 'shoes';
SELECT customer_id, category, color, size FROM preferences ORDER BY category ASC, color DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, category, color, size FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND color = 'Black';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM Preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_products > 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM Preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_products > 2;
SELECT c.first_name, p.product_name FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Preferences pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id INNER JOIN Products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND price > 25 ORDER BY price;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customers.first_name, products.product_name, recommendations.timestamp FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id JOIN products ON recommendations.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customers.first_name, preferences.style, preferences.color FROM customers LEFT JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preferences.color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT p.product_name, p.category, p.price, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM products p JOIN purchases pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id JOIN customers c ON pu.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE pu.quantity > 5;

SELECT r.suggested_product, r.suggestion_rating, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.price FROM recommendations r JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.preferred_category = p.category WHERE p.price < 100;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, SUM(p.price * pu.quantity) AS total_spent FROM purchases pu JOIN customers c ON pu.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
